scripts.start:reset: npm run clean:runtime && npm run start -- --reset-cache
scripts.bundle: npm run clean; npm run bundle:android && npm run bundle:ios && npm run genstrings
scripts.bundle:android: mkdir -p bundle/android && npm run react-native -- bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file ./index.js --assets-dest ./bundle/android --bundle-output ./bundle/android/App.js --sourcemap-output ./bundle/android/App.js.map
scripts.bundle:ios: mkdir -p bundle/ios && npm run react-native -- bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file ./index.js --assets-dest ./bundle/ios --bundle-output ./bundle/ios/App.js --sourcemap-output ./bundle/ios/App.js.map
scripts.install:wpcli: (test -x bin/wp-cli.phar || curl -Ls https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wp-cli/builds/gh-pages/phar/wp-cli.phar -o bin/wp-cli.phar && chmod +x bin/wp-cli.phar) && bin/wp-cli.phar --info
scripts.makepot:android: npm run wp i18n make-pot ./gutenberg/packages --include=*.native.js,*.android.js --exclude=test/* --subtract=./gutenberg.pot --ignore-domain gutenberg-android.pot
scripts.makepot:ios: npm run wp i18n make-pot ./gutenberg/packages --include=*.native.js,*.ios.js --exclude=test/* --subtract=./gutenberg.pot --ignore-domain gutenberg-ios.pot
scripts.premakepot:gutenberg: npm run clean:gutenberg && npm run build:gutenberg
scripts.makepot:gutenberg: npm run wp i18n make-pot ./gutenberg/build --ignore-domain gutenberg.pot
scripts.genstrings: npm run genstrings:android && npm run genstrings:ios
scripts.wpandroid: cd gutenberg && npm run react-native -- run-android --root $TMPDIR/gbmobile-wpandroidfakernroot --variant wasabiDebug --appIdSuffix beta --appFolder WordPress --main-activity=ui.WPLaunchActivity
scripts.test:e2e:bundle:android: mkdir -p gutenberg/packages/react-native-editor/android/app/src/main/assets && npm run react-native -- bundle --reset-cache --platform android --dev false --minify false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output gutenberg/packages/react-native-editor/android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest gutenberg/packages/react-native-editor/android/app/src/main/res
scripts.test:e2e:android:local: npm run test:e2e:bundle:android && npm run test:e2e:build-app:android && npm run test:e2e:install-app:android && npm run test:e2e:start-test-runner:android:local
scripts.test:e2e:bundle:ios: mkdir -p gutenberg/packages/react-native-editor/ios/build/gutenberg/Build/Products/Release-iphonesimulator/GutenbergDemo.app && npm run react-native -- bundle --reset-cache --platform=ios --dev=false --minify false --entry-file=index.js --bundle-output=./gutenberg/packages/react-native-editor/ios/build/gutenberg/Build/Products/Release-iphonesimulator/GutenbergDemo.app/main.jsbundle --assets-dest=./gutenberg/packages/react-native-editor/ios/build/gutenberg/Build/Products/Release-iphonesimulator/GutenbergDemo.app
scripts.test:e2e:ios:local: npm run test:e2e:bundle:ios && npm run test:e2e:build-app:ios && npm run test:e2e:start-test-runner:ios:local
scripts.build:gutenberg: cd gutenberg && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.clean: npm run clean:build-artifacts; npm run clean:aztec; npm run cache clean; npm run clean:haste; npm run clean:jest; npm run clean:metro; npm run clean:react; npm run clean:watchman; npm run clean:node; npm run clean:pot
scripts.clean:runtime: npm run clean:haste; npm run clean:react; npm run clean:metro; npm run clean:jest; npm run clean:watchman; npm run clean:babel-cache
scripts.clean:aztec: cd ../react-native-aztec && npm run clean && cd example && npm run clean
scripts.version: npm run bundle && git add -A bundle
